action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant in the freezer, the plate on the table and the mop in the refrigerator.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a pillow.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a pillow and a potted plant.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a counter and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a book, a table, a shelf and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen and a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a counter and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You can't see a plate here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a counter and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a counter and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a book, a table, a shelf and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen and a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You can't go to a pantry from here.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a counter and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.
You put the potted plant in the freezer.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a counter and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a pillow and a plate.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a couch, a book, a table, a shelf and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen and a hallway here.
You put the plate on the table.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a pillow and a mop.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a living room, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
